plan_context.query: Write a short note on how fast quantum computers currently are. It should be one paragraph and in the style of lecture notes.and write it onto a notion page called quantum

steps.task: Search the internet for current information on the speed capabilities of quantum computers as of now.
Draft a concise paragraph in lecture note style that describes how fast quantum computers currently are, making use of the information from the previous step.

inputs.name: $search_result
inputs.description: Search result information about the speed of quantum computers.

steps.task: Write the drafted note onto a page named 'quantum' by adding it as the first paragraph on that page, using the note text from the previous step.

inputs.name: $quantum_note_text
inputs.description: The drafted note in lecture note style on the speed of quantum computers.
